title: Is it possible to get the Project loading screen border if you get...
body: ...mystery gifted a Project skin (other than Yasuo) during the first week they're available?

replies.body: If it's in the first week, yup! Gifts count towards getting the First Strike loading card.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Bob54nOr,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-03T18:59:24.390+0000)
>
> If it's in the first week, yup! Gifts count towards getting the First Strike loading card.

Thanks for the confirmation :)
I have PROJECT Yasuo, but I don't have the loading screen from First Strike. Also I don't have the special spawning. How can I get them?

Do these loading screens stay after the event?? And do they always appear, or only when playing the champion who you bought? (For example: If i buy the skin for Zed, the loading screen will only be shown when i play Zed?)
i would say yes, here is my reason. If you get gifted  Pulsefire Ezreal, DJ Sona or Spirit Guard Udyr you get the icons that come with the skins.
i'm not too sure, but i would assume so. if worse comes to worse you could probably contact support if you end up getting the skin during the promotion but not get the border!
